deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Good Brother::01 Chorus
deckInfo.description: Covers Level 1 (characters & small words) and Level 2 (phrases) for the Chorus of My Good Brother.

vocabulary.name: qing2yi4
vocabulary.explanation: 情 (qíng) - feeling/emotion + 誼 (yì) - friendship/relationship = friendship, affection.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 歲月 (suìyuè) - years, time

vocabulary.name: sui4yue4
vocabulary.explanation: 歲 (suì) - age/years + 月 (yuè) - moon/month = years, time passing.

vocabulary.name: ji4de
vocabulary.explanation: 記 (jì) - to record/remember + 得 (de) - to obtain/achieve = to remember.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 今生 (jīnshēng) - this life

vocabulary.name: jin1sheng1
vocabulary.explanation: 今 (jīn) - now/present + 生 (shēng) - life/birth = this life.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 難得 (nándé) - rare, hard to come by

vocabulary.name: nan2de2
vocabulary.explanation: 難 (nán) - difficult + 得 (dé) - to obtain = rare, hard to come by.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ) - a glass of wine
conceptGroups.description: Introducing the phrase 一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ).

vocabulary.name: yi1bei1jiu3
vocabulary.explanation: 一 (yī) - one + 杯 (bēi) - cup/glass + 酒 (jiǔ) - wine/alcohol = a glass of wine.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 老歌 (lǎogē) - old song

vocabulary.name: lao3ge1
vocabulary.explanation: 老 (lǎo) - old/aged + 歌 (gē) - song = old song.

conceptGroups.description: Reviewing key phrases from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: pengyou_de_qingyi
vocabulary.explanation: 朋友 (péngyou) - friend + 的 (de) - possessive particle + 情誼 (qíngyì) - friendship.

vocabulary.name: bi_tian_hai_gao
vocabulary.explanation: 比 (bǐ) - compared to + 天 (tiān) - sky + 還 (hái) - still/even + 高 (gāo) - high.

vocabulary.name: bi_di_hai_liaokuo
vocabulary.explanation: 比 (bǐ) - compared to + 地 (dì) - earth + 還 (hái) - still/even + 遼闊 (liáokuò) - vast/expansive.

vocabulary.name: naxie_suiyue
vocabulary.explanation: 那些 (nàxiē) - those + 歲月 (suìyuè) - years/time.

vocabulary.name: women_yiding_hui_jide
vocabulary.explanation: 我們 (wǒmen) - we + 一定 (yīdìng) - definitely + 會 (huì) - will + 記得 (jìde) - remember.

vocabulary.name: jinsheng_zuida_de_nande
vocabulary.englishText: the greatest rarity in this life
vocabulary.explanation: 今生 (jīnshēng) - this life + 最大 (zuìdà) - greatest + 的 (de) - possessive particle + 難得 (nándé) - rare.

vocabulary.name: xiang_yi_bei_jiu
vocabulary.explanation: 像 (xiàng) - like + 一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ) - a glass of wine.

vocabulary.name: xiang_yi_shou_laoge
vocabulary.explanation: 像 (xiàng) - like + 一 (yī) - one + 首 (shǒu) - measure word for songs + 老歌 (lǎogē) - old song.
